channel.title: Thinking on Jim Shingler Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Thinking on Jim Shingler Blog

item.title: Value Line
item.description: Introduction: During a presentation on Cloud Foundry by James Watters, I was introduced to the concept of "The Value Line." This framework, along with Geoffery Moore's "Core vs Context" from his book Dealing with Darwin., provides a valuable thinking tool to help businesses focus on innovation and business value. "The Value Line" and "Core vs Context" combine to create a thinking framework. The Value Line Framework The Value Line Framework is divided into two sections: the Core and the Context.
